actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to increase the maximum amount which may be deducted from gross income for retirement savings to 2,500 dollars for a single individual and 5,000 dollars for a married couple.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the maximum amount which may be deducted from gross income for retirement savings to $2,500 for a single individual and $5,000 for a married couple.

titles.title: A bill to increase the maximum amount which may be deducted from gross income for retirement savings to 2,500 dollars for a single individual and 5,000 dollars for a married couple.
